lemma "\<exists> X. \<sigma> \<Turnstile> (_ \<leftarrow> assume\<^sub>S\<^sub>E P ; x \<leftarrow> M; assert\<^sub>S\<^sub>E (\<lambda>\<sigma>. x=X \<and> Q x \<sigma>)) \<Longrightarrow> \<sigma> \<Turnstile> (_ \<leftarrow> assume\<^sub>S\<^sub>E P ; x \<leftarrow> M; assert\<^sub>S\<^sub>E (\<lambda>\<sigma>. Q x \<sigma>))"
